mapper.select: select my_user.id as user_id, my_user.username, my_user.password, my_user.zq, my_user.jbz, my_user.department, my_user.timestamp, onps_role.name as role from my_user,onps_role,user_role where my_user.username = #{username} and my_user.password = #{password} and my_user.id = user_role.user_id and onps_role.id = user_role.role_id
mapper.insert: insert into my_user(username, password, ZQ, JBZ, department) values (#{username},#{password},#{ZQ},#{JBZ},#{department})
mapper.update: update my_user set ZQ = #{ZQ}, JBZ = #{JBZ}, department = #{department}, where id = #{id}
